vision

Building a strong community of alumni of JNV Betul to keep them connected, serve the society in a better way through our community. To make the students of JNV future ready, competent with the outside world and keep the glory of JNV Betul over the years to come.

mission

To bring all the alumni and students of JNV Betul on a single platform and create a network to enable the alumni to remain connected with their Alma mater and provide career guidance to help them shape their future.
